scheduled.label: Pre-Session Confidence
scheduled.target: Agenda - How confident do you feel about your writing assignment right now? (1="Not at all"; 5="Very")
scheduled.source: Agenda - How confident do you feel about your writing assignment right now? (1="Not at all"; 5="Very")

scheduled.label: First Appointment?
scheduled.target: Agenda - Is this your first appointment?
scheduled.source: Agenda - Is this your first appointment?

scheduled.label: Visit Context
scheduled.target: Agenda - Please check one of the following boxes to help us determine the context of your visit.
scheduled.source: Agenda - Please check one of the following boxes to help us determine the context of your visit.

scheduled.label: Writing Stage
scheduled.target: Agenda - Roughly speaking, what stage of the writing process are you in right now?
scheduled.source: Agenda - Roughly speaking, what stage of the writing process are you in right now?

scheduled.label: Focus Area
scheduled.target: Agenda - What would you like to focus on during this appointment?
scheduled.source: Agenda - What would you like to focus on during this appointment?

scheduled.label: Paper Due Date
scheduled.target: Agenda - When is your paper due?
scheduled.source: Agenda - When is your paper due?

scheduled.label: Post-Session Confidence
scheduled.target: Student - How confident do you feel about your writing assignment now that your meeting is over (1="Not at all"; 5="Very")?
scheduled.source: Student - How confident do you feel about your writing assignment now that your meeting is over (1="Not at all"; 5="Very")?
aliases: Student - How confident do you feel about your writing assignment now that your meeting is over? (1="Not at all"; 5="Very")

scheduled.label: Overall Satisfaction
scheduled.target: Student - How satisfied are you with the help you received at the Writing Studio (1="extremely dissatisfied," 7="extremely satisfied")?
scheduled.source: Student - How satisfied are you with the help you received at the Writing Studio (1="extremely dissatisfied," 7="extremely satisfied")?
aliases: Student - On a scale of 1-7 (1="extremely dissatisfied," 7="extremely satisfied"), how satisfied are you with the help you received at the Writing Studio?

scheduled.label: Tutor Rapport
scheduled.target: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="not at all," 5="extremely well"), how well did you get along with your tutor?
scheduled.source: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="not at all," 5="extremely well"), how well did you get along with your tutor?

scheduled.label: Platform Ease
scheduled.target: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="not easy at all", 5="extremely easy"), how easy was it to use our website and scheduling software to schedule and attend your appointment?
scheduled.source: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="not easy at all", 5="extremely easy"), how easy was it to use our website and scheduling software to schedule and attend your appointment?

scheduled.label: Session Quality
scheduled.target: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="very poorly", 5="very well"), how well would you say your appointment went?
scheduled.source: Student - On a scale of 1-5 (1="very poorly", 5="very well"), how well would you say your your appointment went?

scheduled.label: Incentives Offered
scheduled.target: Student - Were you offered any of the following incentives for today's visit? Please select any that apply.
scheduled.source: Student - Were you offered any of the following incentives for today's visit? Please select any that apply.

scheduled.label: Tutor Session Rating
scheduled.target: Tutor - Overall, how well would you say that the consultation went?
scheduled.source: Tutor - Overall, how well would you say that the consultation went?
